segments.text: By the way , how many books am I allowed to check out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can check out two books at a time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long can I keep the books ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For two weeks . After that you must renew the books if you wish to keep them longer .
segments.speaker: S2
